Package com.group12.controller

Class OnlineGameController

java.lang.Object
com.group12.controller.OnlineGameController
@Component public class OnlineGameController extends Object
The OnlineGameController class is responsible for handling the online interactions of the game. This includes sending requests, making moves, sending chat messages, etc.

  • Method Details

    • initData

      public void initData(StompClient stompClient, String color, String[] playerUsernameList, String[] userColorList, String gameId)
      A controller method to initialize some data about the game at the very beginning.
      Parameters:
      stompClient - - Stomp client which will be used to send game commands through websocket connection.
      color - - Client's color code to initialize it's color on the board.
      playerUsernameList - - List of players usernames in the lobby.
      userColorList - - List of players colors in the lobby.
      gameId - - Current game instance's id.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      A method to set and initialize some data (setting client username, background image, etc.)

      public void showOptionalSettlements()
      A button action to show optional settlements.

      A button action to show optional roads specifically for the setup phase.

      public void showOptionalUpgrades()
      A button action to show optional upgrades from a settlement to a city.

      public void skipTurn() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A button action to skip turn.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

      event - - Mouse event when the image get clicked.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • diceThrowAnimation

      public void diceThrowAnimation(String turnUsername, int firstDiceResult, int secondDiceResult)
      A method to run dice rolling animation.
      Parameters:
      turnUsername - - Current turn's username.
      firstDiceResult - - First dice result
      secondDiceResult - - Second dice result

    • gatherNewResources

      public void gatherNewResources(int diceResult) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to gather new resources from the tiles that are adjacent to the owned settlements/cities.
      Parameters:
      diceResult - - Sum of first and the second dice results.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • gatherResourcesAtSetup

      public void gatherResourcesAtSetup(String circleId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to gather resources at the second turn of the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      circleId - - Settlement that is built in the setup phase
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • updateResourcePanels

      public void updateResourcePanels(int totalGain) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to update resource panels after gathering or losing resources.
      Parameters:
      totalGain - - Total gain or lose of resources.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • refreshClientResources

      public void refreshClientResources()
      A method to refresh resources board at the bottom of the scene.

    • updateScorePanel

      public void updateScorePanel() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method to refresh score board on the right side of the scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Exception while sending the message.
      InterruptedException - - Exception while sending the message.

    • setPlayerResourceInfoPanel

      public void setPlayerResourceInfoPanel(String username, String msgContent)
      A method to update user resources related information on the right panel.
      Parameters:
      username - - Player username whose resources will be updated.
      msgContent - - Message content.

    • setPlayerScorePanel

      public void setPlayerScorePanel(String username, String msgContent)

    • rollDice

      public void rollDice(javafx.scene.image.ImageView diceImage, int diceResult)
      A method to roll the dice for all players at the same time.
      Parameters:
      diceImage - - Dice image which is clicked on.
      diceResult - - Sum of dice result one and two.

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard(String boardData)
      A method to set the board tiles with random resource types and numbers.
      Parameters:
      boardData - - Board data which comes from the websocket server.

    • setupHelper

      public void setupHelper(String turnUsername)
      Setup phase skip turn helper.
      Parameters:
      turnUsername - - Current turn's username.

    • turnHelper

      public void turnHelper(String turnUsername)
      Skip turn helper function to handle button toggle actions, panel on/off etc.
      Parameters:
      turnUsername - - Current turn's username.

    • toggleOnButtons

      public void toggleOnButtons()
      A method to toggle on buttons according to resource constraints.

    • toggleOffButtons

      public void toggleOffButtons(Boolean isAll)
      A method to toggle off all the functional button in the game interface.
      Parameters:
      isAll - - Boolean value to decide if all the button should be turned off including skipTurn.

      msg - - Message instance which contains the upgraded settlement's information.

      A method to open trade panel in the bottom-left corner of the screen.

      public void closeTradePanels()
      A method to close trade offer panel in the bottom-left corner of the screen.

      A method to close trade offer panel in the top-right corner of the screen.

    • sendTradeOffer

      public void sendTradeOffer() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to send trade offer through websocket connection.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • showTradeOffer

      public void showTradeOffer(Message msg)
      A method to show trade offer panel after getting TRADE_OFFER_RECEIVED message through websocket connection.
      Parameters:
      msg - - Message instance came from websocket connection.

    • acceptTradeOffer

      public void acceptTradeOffer() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to call after accepting a trade. Sends a message back to websocket with message type TRADE_OFFER_ACCEPTED.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • tradeOfferAccepted

      public void tradeOfferAccepted(Message msg)
      A method called after trade offer has been accepted. Refreshes client resource panels.
      Parameters:
      msg - - Message instance which contains resource type that are used in trade.

    • updateResourcesAfterTrade

      public void updateResourcesAfterTrade(String gainedResource, String lostResource)
      A method to update resources if the trade offer is accepted.
      Parameters:
      gainedResource - - Gained resource type by the trade.
      lostResource - - Lost resource type by the trade.

    • checkScore

      public void checkScore() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method to check the score and decide if the game is ended by the current player. If score is high enough GAME_ENDED message is sent through the websocket connection.
      Throws:
      IOException - - This is an exception for creating the request.
      InterruptedException - - This is an exception for sending the request.

    • gameEnded

      public void gameEnded(Message msg)
      A method to call when the game has been finished. According to results, different actions are taken. Winners and losers see and hear different result banners and sounds. GameHistory is logged at the end of the game for each player.
      Parameters:
      msg - - Message instance.

    • backToMenu

      public void backToMenu() throws IOException
      A method to allow user to get back to the lobby screen at the end of the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - - This is an exception for the scene load function.

    • highlightPlayerInfoBox

      public void highlightPlayerInfoBox(String username)
      A method to highlight player info box at the right panel.
      Parameters:
      username - - Username of the players which will be highlighted.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      A method to send chat messages through websocket connection.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - - exception of json serialize/deserialize function.

    • addChatMessage

      public void addChatMessage(Message msg)
      A method to add a chat message with a color.
      Parameters:
      msg - - Message instance.

    • addChatMessage

      public void addChatMessage(String message)
      A method to add a generic chat message.

      message - - Message instance.
